```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(readr)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	fig.width = 9, 
  fig.asp = .6,
  out.width = "90%"
)
theme_set(theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "bottom"))
options(
  ggplot2.continuous.colour = "viridis",
  ggplot2.continuous.fill = "viridis"
)
scale_colour_discrete = scale_colour_viridis_d
scale_fill_discrete = scale_fill_viridis_d
```

Clean data:

  * Clean names
  * Select relevant predictors & outcomes
  * Drop neighborhoods that have no population
  
  
```{r}
project_df = read_excel("./data/nta-metadata.xlsx", sheet = "NTA Data") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(nta_name:female, hispanic:foreign_born,edu_less_than_hs:poverty,unemployment,teen_births:smm_reliability, hiv:late_no_prenatal_care) %>%
  drop_na(total_pop)
```
